name: Duke Nukem 3D: Duke It Out in D.C.
name_original: Duke Nukem 3D: Duke It Out in D.C.
description:
Duke Nukem 3D: Duke It Out in D.C. is an action game developed by Sunstorm Interactive. It was originally released in 1997. Sunstorm Interactive published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Duke Nukem 3D: Duke It Out in D.C. on PC.
